name: 瓦连京娜·玛利亚维娜 Valentina Malyavina
intro: Birth Name Valentina Aleksandrovna Malyavina Spouse Aleksandr Zbruev (May 1959 - March 1963) (divorced) Trivia: Was sentenced for 9 years of prison in 1982 for the murder of Stanislav Zhdanko in 1977. Released in 1987.
